en.intro_text: I'm Igor, I'm an editor and translator.
en.body_text:
m.me/igor.kuldmaa && igor.kuldmaa@gmail.com

I translate from English and Estonian into Russian in a human way. I also dabble a bit in Python, C languages, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and so on. You can offer me a project or just buy me coffee.
